text: George Gilmer may refer to: * George Gilmer Sr. (1700–1757), mayor of Williamsburg, Virginia * George Rockingham Gilmer (1790–1859), American statesman and politician in Georgia ==See also== *George Gilmore (1898–1985), Protestant IRA leader *George Crosby Gilmore (1860–1937), Australian politician *George Gilmour (1900–1963), academic
title: George Gilmer
